description: This file defines a React functional component named 'App' that manages a theme toggle (light/dark mode), renders a button to switch themes, displays a logo, and includes a link to React documentation. It imports React hooks, a logo image, CSS styles, and a Thumbnail component.

methods.name: App
methods.description: React functional component that manages theme state and renders UI elements including a toggle button, logo, and link.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to switch the theme between 'light' and 'dark'.
